# [Interview #759: Theoryland: An Hour with Harriet McDougal Rigney, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=759#22)

#### Matt Hatch

Does
[Rianna](http://encyclopaedia-wot.org/characters/r/rianna_andomeran.html)
's white streak come from you, or is it the other way around?

#### Harriet McDougal

I have no idea!
